ExamplesÂ¶

Best way to get hands on with pyphoon is have a look at some code examples. In this section we present what we believe are the most important tools and features from the library. Make sure to read the data section before.

In addition, we released some notebooks that you may access here.

  • Best Track EDA
    • Load all the best data
    • Consider only real data
    • Plot histogram of classes
    • Plot histogram of pressure
    • Wind speed time analysis
  • Working with a typhoon sequence
    • Load a typhoon sequence data
    • Visualise a typhoon sequence
    • Export typhoon sequence
  • Correcting image data
    • Define and apply fixing algorithm
  • Create database
